title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Pioneering Agentic AI Transformation: CSL VMware & SAP modernization (MAM346)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 开创代理式AI转型：CSL VMware与SAP现代化 (MAM346)
abstract: Explore CSL's comprehensive transformation strategy focused on migrating complex VMware workloads and consolidating fragmented SAP systems to build a more agile and resilient foundation. Learn how CSL leveraged agentic AI with AWS Transform to reduce technical debt and licensing costs across 4000+ VMware servers, revolutionizing traditional migration approaches and accelerating discovery and planning processes by 10x. You'll also discover how CSL unified their fragmented ERP landscape and established enterprise-wide data standards through RISE with SAP on AWS. Gain technical guidance, get inspired with lessons learned, and walk away with actionable insights that you can use in your organization.
abstract_cn: 探索CSL的全面转型战略，重点关注迁移复杂的VMware工作负载并整合分散的SAP系统，以构建更加敏捷和具有韧性的基础架构。了解CSL如何利用AWS Transform的代理AI来减少4000多台VMware服务器的技术债务和许可成本，彻底改变传统迁移方法，并将发现和规划流程加速10倍。您还将了解CSL如何通过AWS上的RISE with SAP统一其分散的ERP环境并建立企业级数据标准。获取技术指导，从经验教训中获得启发，并带走可在您的组织中使用的可操作见解。
